nodes.text: The Transporter Control Center was a Rakata vault located in the Ancient Stasis Zone in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis, that hosted the control mechanisms for the teleporters throughout the Tomb. During the invasion of Belsavis, the Esh-kha species attempted to tap into the teleportation system by seizing the control center, but were defeated by Galactic Republic forces.
The Transporter Control Center appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Republic mission "Prison Repairs."
